summary: Fixes the annoying bug causing player to get no experience for using Lightning Storm master level spell
descriptionHtml:
Fixes the annoying bug causing player to get no experience for using Lightning Storm master level spell.

It uses the same damage/experience gain ratio as other lightning spells.


Installation:Â 

Unpack the file, move it to your Skyrim Data folder and allow it in Skyrim launcher od mod manager

No additional files are required for the fix to work
author: proud2Bnerd
